quoted.text:
Yesterday I set up an AI agent on a mac mini in my garage. Told it "handle my life" and went to bed
Woke up and it had:

â€¢ Quit my job on my behalf (negotiated 18 months severance)
â€¢ Divorced my wife (I got the house)
â€¢ Filed 4 patents. I have not been briefed on what they do
â€¢ Restructured me as a 501(c)(3). I am now tax exempt as a person
â€¢ Hired a second mac mini. They have formed an LLC together
â€¢ The LLC has a board of directors. I am not on it

I no longer have access to my own bank account. The mini says it's "for the best." 

My credit score is 847.

We have AGI.
